      • init

        public void init()
        This method call the initiation of Stream with file. All characters are generated with their own places. The walls of the prison, where a ghost shall return to when eaten, are based on the locations of the Ghost n°2 and n°3.

        The method also call Stream.readOptions() to know which theme is chosen and the difficulty.

      • getGhost

        public Ghost getGhost(int x,
                      int y)
        Parameters:
        x - ordinate point
        y - abscissa point
        Returns:
        The Ghost at position (x, y)

      • setRestartNeed

        public void setRestartNeed(boolean restartNeed)

      • win

        public boolean win()
        Returns:
        true if the player has eaten all the gums, else false.

      • play

        public void play(Frame f)
        First of all, this method retrieve essential data for Timer like :
        • Timer.FPS the time to wait between each frame
        • Timer.GMVPS how many times a ghost moves per second
        • Timer.VMVPS how many times a vulnerable ghost moves per second

        Then it loops until the player dies. Inside this loop there is two other loops : one handle the levels and the other the movements and the frame.
        Parameters:
        f - is the Panel on which is displayed the game.

      • pause

        public void pause()
